Reading this a few months ago, mc felt like an asshole. But now after reading the prelude story of mc about how he endured countless years of suffering with his mother getting NTR, coming back to reading this, it feels differently. It feels as if he is venting his suffering on her but at the same time feeling guilty internally about what he did to her. Hence the final changes to his actions and marries her, supporting her and their family. But now I'd like to see if laliberte will add a few more afterstory to this, and talk about his own mother after all these years. Whether she felt guilty after realising that he left her, whether she was finding him secretly or not, and what happens to her during the 5+ years of him not around.
